data.name: RPG Sounds - Royal Feast - Sound Pack
data.detailed_description:
Royal Feast is an RPG Sounds pack of looping music, ambient sounds, and SFX. It includes:

Music
  • Chateau
  • Guest Library
  • Recreation Room
  • Dragon Hall

Ambience
  • Cuttlery And Silverware
  • Hum of Voices

SFX
  • Champagne Open (4)
  • Bell Chime
  • Griffin Call (4)
  • Royal Horse Neigh (4)
  • Trumpet Royal Announcement (4)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 capabilities

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.12
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 capabilities
